To make this a success he decides to ask for Seema, Malhotra's daughter's hand in marriage with his son Roopesh, to which Seema agrees, and the marriage date is set. However, Seema decision changes as she meets poor Vijay and both fall in love with each other. When she tell her father about her decision he refuses, and she is made to marry Roopesh. On there nuptial night Seema and her husband have had a small scuffle which results in Seema loosing her memory. Will Seema ever get back her memory? What will happen to Vijay? Will Mr. Malhotra ever gets informed that he is heading for danger?—gavin (gunmasterM@hotmail.com)

Title: A Man of Principle
Synopsis: In Colombia, from the second half of the nineteenth century, two political parties; The traditional liberal and conservative ¸ fought a series of civil wars for almost one hundred years of bloodshed in the country. The last of these To know as "La Violencia" ¸ began following the assassination of popular leader Jorge Eliecer Gaitan ¸ The April 9, 1948. That day began a dark period that lasted a decade in which met the key role hired murderers ¸ called "Pajaros" ¸ such as Leon Maria Lozano ¸ The most notorious of all. "The Condor."—Diego Alvarez In Colombia, from the second half of the nineteenth century, two political parties; The traditional liberal and conservative ¸ fought a series of civil wars for almost one hundred years of bloodshed in the country. The last of these To know as "La Violencia" ¸ began following the assassination of popular leader Jorge Eliecer Gaitan ¸ The April 9, 1948. That day began a dark period that lasted a decade in which met the key role hired murderers ¸ called "Pajaros" ¸ such as Leon Maria Lozano ¸ The most notorious of all. "The Condor."Leon Maria Lozano, a humble member of the Conservative Party is humiliated in his hometown of Liberal majority but the arrival of "La Violencia" makes it an unscrupulous murderer in the service of his party by accepting only enough to live, just on principle.

Title: Devil Fetus 2: The Rape After
Synopsis: The figure of an evil genius is stolen by a photographer. At night the genius comes to life and rapes his girlfriend while both of them are drunk.

Title: Daginik Yatak
Synopsis: Meryem, who opposes male domination and behaves very strictly to her hired lovers, falls in love with Ismail, who works as a waitress at an invitation she attends.

Title: Maqsad
Synopsis: A wealthy industrialist is murdered and the blame falls on a person who hails from a poor family. To prove his innocence, he must strive hard to prove and gather evidence that clears him of this crime. Rajeshwar belongs to a wealthy family, and is the only son of Dharamraj, who is an industrialist, and partners with Naglingam Reddy, Nagendra, and Dhanraj. Rajeshwar meets Bharati, who comes from a very poor family, and falls in love with her. Bharati's father is a schoolteacher, Vishnupratap, and has also to beg for food house to house to make ends meet. Bharati initially does not reciprocrate Rajeshwar's affection, but when she realizes that he really does love her, she too falls in love with him. Bharati's has a neighbor, Tilak, who is unemployed, and lives with his mother, Sharda, who works as a maidservant in a rich family's house. Tilak falls in love with the daughter, Rani, of this rich family. Both Rajeshwar and Tilak dislike each other. Then Dharamraj gets killed, and the evidence points towards Tilak. Tilak is arrested and unless he can gather evidence that clears him, he may face the death sentence.—rAjOo (gunwanti@hotmail.com)

Title: W starym dworku czyli niepodleglosc trójkatów
Synopsis: In a country house at the turn of a century live a family of eccentrics. Middle-aged Anastasia, the beautiful mistress of the manor, enjoys the amorous attentions of her sensitive artist stepson Jezory so openly that her old husband Dyapanazego takes out his shotgun and shoots her. The rest of the family accepts her end as a matter-of-fact, and soon - her return as a voyeuristic ghost who interferes with their love lives. She has a posthumous son Tadeusz, "born" by clambering out of the tree trunk. She seduces him too, and drives other men so crazy that they kill her a couple of times.—Polish Cinema Database <http://info.fuw.edu.pl/Filmy/>

Title: Run Chrissie Run!
Synopsis: The action moves along quickly in this made-for-television drama about Eve, an ex-terrorist from Germany who is forced to escape to Australia with her teenage daughter Chrissie when she is sought by Riley, a lover from 17 years in the past. In turn, the IRA has sent two members after Riley because he shot an IRA soldier and must pay the consequences. The two IRA operatives looking for Riley come across a really nasty biker who wants vengeance on Eve for setting his car on fire -- and the three men finally track her and Chrissie to the wine-growing country of Barossa Valley. The final denouement is about to explode, as Riley also arrives on the scene. With under-par acting and a patchy plot, this film was never released theatrically.—abracadabra

Title: Divorce
Synopsis: Mr. Oswal (Om Shivpuri) is a very rich, influential, domineering man who lives with his wife (Sulochana) and two sons, Jayant (Girish Karnad) and Ajay (Vijayendra Ghatge). Mr. Oswal convinces his elder son Jayant that he cannot marry the girl he loves, Chandra (Sharmila Tagore); he must marry the girl of his father's choice. Jayant is disheartened but agrees to marry the girl of his father's choice (Bindu). Ajay is disappointed with his brother's decision; has fallen in love with Seema (Jasmine), the daughter of a college teacher (Satyen Kappu). Ajay elopes with Jasmine and marries her. They settle down, he gets a job driving a taxi, and Seem works as a nurse in a hospital. One night Ajay sees Seema leaving their house with a man and files for divorce, accusing her of infidelity. Seema is devastated. After the divorce, Ajay joins the army and goes to fight in Bangla Desh, who is with war against Pakistan. Back in the Oswal home, Mr. Oswal has learned that his choice of daughter-in-law has not been a good one; his wife is seriously ill and missing her younger son, little knowing that circumstances are leading them to nothing but a tragic end. Who was the man with Seema that night? Will things go back to normal in the Oswal family?—rAjOo (gunwanti@hotmail.com)

Title: L'étincelle
Synopsis: A beautiful DJ starts a romantic relationship with an older antiquarian. The only problem: she's pregnant and already hitched.

Title: Vacanze in America
Synopsis: A group of students from the San Crispino School for Boys take a holiday in the United States, traveling from New York, through Utah, all the way to Los Angeles. Young Father Don Buro (Christian De Sica) has great difficulty controlling the youngsters, especially with troublemaking ex-student Peo (Jerry Calà) along for the trip, and he gets distracted by the attractive single mother of one of the boys (Edwige Fenech).—Il Tesoro

Title: István, a király
Synopsis: After the death of Géza, the Hungarian monarch, his son István and his brother Koppány gets in a conflict for the Hungarian throne. Their battle should settle the fate of Hungary: whether it adopts Christianity or remains in Paganism.

Title: Nema problema
Synopsis: The manager of a company gets in trouble when he cannot pay his workers. The billions were spent on a football stadium which is empty now, and the bank did not approve new credits for the meaningless investments. Maybe the stadium will get filled during the concert of popular singer Lepa Brena (played by herself).

Title: John Jani Janardhan
Synopsis: A sincere police officer is killed by a liquor dealer. Years later, his twin sons set out to avenge their father's death. Inpsector John A. Mendez is an honest and diligent Police Inspector, who lives a middle-class lifestyle with his wife, Cheryl, and a maidservant, Fatimabi. John bursts a gang that makes illicit liquor and holds them in a cell, bringing him into confrontation with their leader, Gajanand alias Gajju, who goes to threaten John, but is himself arrested and sentenced. When he is discharged he decides to avenge his humiliation by entrapping John and killing him. Cheryl gives birth to twin sons and passes away. A rich childless couple, Brijmohan and Girja Gupta adopt one of the twins and name him Janardhan, while the second is named Jani and lives with Fatimabi. Twenty five years later, Janardhan is an American-returned young man, in love with Madhu. On his birthday party he comes face to face with a man named Gopaldas, and his entire personality changes as he is taken over by the vengeful spirit of John. Subsequently, Gopaldas is killed, and Janardhan is arrested and tried in Court. Things seem to go in Janardhan's favor, when the wily Gajju brings out a new witness - none other than Jani - who is now masquerading as John. Gajju hopes to kill Janardhan and thus prevent John from avenging his death - and nothing will stop Gajju to carry out his evil plan.—rAjOo (gunwanti@hotmail.com)

Title: Ang padrino
Synopsis: Portrayed the character of the hired assassin who plots the slaying of the lead character, played by FPJ.

Title: Pejzazi u magli
Synopsis: Naturalistic and almost documentary account of the heroin addicts in Belgrade, in the form of a sad life story of young girl and her wasted life.

Title: Wanderers of the Desert
Synopsis: A teacher is assigned to a remote desert village that is obsessed with a mysterious buried treasure and whose children are cursed to wander the desert.

Title: State of Reality
Synopsis: The film centers on a unsuccessful doctor and his patient, whom everyone believes has no hope of ever recovering from a recent accident, and the daily events of a public hospital in Argentina. A young man is on the verge of death due to a traffic accident. Only a doctor keep hope in his recovery: family, friends, and the health institution itself have abandoned him. The relationships established between these two men and with the other characters are obscured by the rarefied atmosphere of those years. An essential factor to consider is the historical moment where the action takes place: the final years of the last civic-military dictatorship in Argentina. This fact is central to better understand the characters and their reactions.—dakonero

Title: Kulswamini Ambabai
Synopsis: Laxmi was born to her parents after 15 years by blessings of Goddess Mahalaxmi and she is also a true devote of the Goddess.Vilas Deshmukh a womanizer and only son of Deshmukh family is known for his bad habits of drinking and womanizing once gets slapped by Laxmi when he tries to stalk her.Vilas tells his mother Aaisaheb and sister Jaya that he will only marry Laxmi and not anyone else his brother in law Vasantrao whose made to dance on tunes of Jaya and Aaisaheb goes with a marriage proposal where Laxmi's uncle makes her father aware of Vilas's habits who decides to give a chance as Vilas could change after marriage. On the night of wedding a huge path of Deshmukh's farming land catches fire and Laxmi is termed as unlucky to the family while Vilas revels that he married her for revenge.Laxmi is sent back to her parents hope but she returns back and is ready to face all the brunt from her husband and in laws by keeping her faith in her Goddess that things will be better soon.—alex.mjacko@gmail.com

Title: Fanny Pelopaja
Synopsis: Violence and delinquency are Fanny's only way of life. An ex-cop known as "el Gallego" was expelled from the police force because of his irregular methods, particularly for cruelly abusing Fanny. They're looking for one another, both with the idea of murder. However, a feeling that is very different from hatred begins to occupy their respective minds. When they meet, they won't know how to react.—Lolafilms

Title: S.O.S. Sex-Shop
Synopsis: After seven years, Cláudio and Elisa's marriage is in danger. Some friends take Cláudio to a sex-shop, where he buys a rubber tongue, a little device that can save their relationship. After seven years, the marriage of the real state agent Claudio and Elisa loses the sex drive and becomes boring. Elisa has not come for three years and Claudio tells his problem to his co-workers Aristides, Dinho and Gilberto. Dinho and Gilberto take him to a sex-shop and Dinho gives a sex-toy tongue to him. When Claudio uses the tongue in his wife, she fells pleasure and has an orgasm but Claudio feels impotent. Elisa tells her problem to her colleague Leda that is lesbian and gives new neckline dresses to her. Meanwhile Dinho invites Claudio and Elisa to have a drink at his apartment with his wife Sueli and then he chats Elisa up. When Claudio's first wife Beatriz travels with her boyfriend Ronaldo to Buenos Aires, she leaves their son Marcelo with Claudio that brings the boy to his home. Claudio's mother comes to visit her grandson and she finds the couple arguing and ending their relationship. But they air their dirty laundry in public and resolve their issues.—Claudio Carvalho, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

Title: Aaj Ki Awaz
Synopsis: A Professor finds his life turned upside down after he decides to combat crime. Seemingly inspired by 'Death Wish', this film is the story of one man against the system. When his sister is raped and his mother killed by a gang of thugs, the hero turns to the police for help, but is let down by corrupt officials. Finally, he takes the law into his own hands.—Anonymous A middle-classed resident of Andheri's Bharat Nagar, Professor Prabhat Kumar Varma, who teaches Hindi and Sanskrit; lives with his widowed mom, and sister, Madhu, is concerned about the city's crime levels. He approaches Police Commissioner Sathe, who in turn, deputes Inspector Dhamle to look into this matter. Then Professor Lalwani's sister-in-law, Sudha Advani, is abducted, sexually assaulted, and killed. The killer, identified as Suresh Thakur, is arrested, tried in Court, and acquitted after he proves that he was in Delhi at the time of incident. Prabhat and others form a vigilante group and chase criminal elements out of their area, much to the ire of their boss, Jagmohandas, who will soon ensure that Prabhat's world is turned upside down.—rAjOo (gunwanti@hotmail.com) When violence reigns, lawlessness prevails; this is the cry of today, which we hear night and day. But in the deafening noise of violence and anarchy there is also a gentler but challenging voice which refuses to remain silent and let evil prevail. Such a voice is that of Prof. Prabhat Varma , a poet and a professor of Sanskrit who comes to Bombay and finds himself unwittingly drawn into the vortex of lawlessness and violence. In trying to raise his voice of protest he draws on himself the violent reaction of the under world gangs, one of which tries to teach him a lesson by brutally raping his sister and killing his mother. Knowing about the inadequacy of law that seeks evidence as a precondition of justice, Prabhat launches a one-man crusade against all evildoers - and in the process becomes an avenging angel destroying all those who perpetrate terrorism and death on peace loving citizens. When his mission to bring peace to the terrorized and tormented public was accomplished he decides to surrender himself to the police so that he is able to face the court and defend himself. His main aim is to tell the court that whatever he did it was not to take law in his own hands but to protect law from those who broke it. Advocate Rajani strives along with him in this struggle. Will they succeed in proving his innocence to the law?—gavin (gunmasterM@hotmail.com)

Title: W's Tragedy
Synopsis: Young college student Shizuka is given the opportunity to act in a stage play with professionals. Shizuka is willing to go to great lengths to master this role of a lifetime, but as the plot unfolds, she realizes that real life events are beginning to parallel events in the play.

Title: Never Again
Synopsis: A young teenage boy with a zest for sports and singing is seriously injured in a motorcycle accident. The story revolves around his shock at the way his life has changed and his difficulty in coping with his new reality. The boy, played by Latin singing star Luis Miguel at age 14, sings several songs in the movie.—Anonymous

Title: Bin Kamacha Navra
Synopsis: Tukaram a lazy husband interested only in every woman rather than his wife. Tukya ,Namya and Nivrutti are three lazy friends doing nothing they want to make quick money by shortcut means and spend their time with politician Sahebrao doing odd jobs .The only thing they are interested in is watching Tamasha's of Sundra and will do it at any cost.Their wives are fed up with them as they never are not ready to change when they decide to stand in elections with help of Sahebrao.Their wives decide to stand opposite them to teach them lesson.—alex.mjacko@gmail.com

Title: Awaaz
Synopsis: Advocate Jayant defends his clients and gets them off the hook, even if they are guilty. However, when his wife is raped by the son of a gangster he has been defending, he vows to take revenge. Jayant is an advocate, and practices law in the Bombay High Court. He lives with his wife, Anu, and a sister named Priya. His paths cross with his Police Inspector friend, Amit Gupta, who feels that lawyers like Jayant should be more responsible when they defend known criminals, who are repeat offenders. But Jayant only knows that he does his job well - which is to defend his client to the best of his ability. Then Amit gets killed in the line of duty, and his death is ruled as an accident. Amit's younger brother, Vijay, now joins the Police Force, and is assigned the task of finding out whether Amit's death was accidental or otherwise. Vijay finds out that his brother's death was a well-planned execution by underworld gangsters, and arrests the son of Mulchand Malhotra. Then a few days later, Jayant's wife and sister are brutally raped, and his traumatized wife passes away. Jayant has vowed to find the assailants, but before he could attempt anything his daughter, Nandita, is kidnapped. The kidnappers want Jayant to represent Mulchand's son, and get him acquitted. Jayant does an excellent job, and gets his client out on bail. What Jayant does not know that his client is the one who had raped his wife and sister, and when Jayant does find out - what can he possibly do - with his daughter still under the control of her kidnappers.—rAjOo (gunwanti@hotmail.com)

Title: Non-Stop Trouble with My Double
Synopsis: A wealthy businessman and the owner of a rundown pub share one thing in common - they look like identical twins! When the businessman hears of a plot against him, he hires the pub owner as a decoy. However, the pub owner is accident prone and causes more trouble than he is worth. An action-packed, physical comedy.—Fryingham

Title: The City Girl
Synopsis: A young woman photographer engaged to be married to a businessman investigates a cult in the local club scene. By living out some of her sexual fantasies she faces the truth about her life and helps one of the cult's victims escape.

Title: Unfinished Business
Synopsis: Seventeen year old Isabelle Marks lives in Toronto with her divorced mother and finds her life directionless. Isabelle becomes involved with an anti-nuclear group that her boyfriend Jessie 'Fixit' is connected with and is arrested at a demonstration.—Will Gilbert

Title: Tohfa
Synopsis: Two sisters fall for the same man. One of them sacrifices her love but she is carrying a secret. Janki and Lalita are sisters who love each other dearly.Lalita and Ram are in love unknown to them Janki also secretly loves Ram.When Lalita finds about it she decides to sacrifice her love and marries good for nothing Kamlesh.Janki and Ram are get furious on her for taking such a step.Many years later.Ram and Lalita are happily married and he meets Lalita whose bringing up her son as single mother.Ram finds that he is father of the kid and is torn between the two women.—alex.mjacko@gmail.com Janaki (Jaya Prada) brings up her younger sister Lalitha (Sridevi) after their parents die. She sacrifices all to make sure that Lakshmi has the best of everything, including a college education. The sisters love each other immensely. When Ram, a fellow villager returns from the city as a qualified lawyer, both sisters secretly are in love with him. When one of them finds out that the other is in love, she promptly marries the local hooligan Kaamesh Singh because she is already pregnant. Ram marries the other sister.As it turns out, not just her sister, but the entire community is flabbergasted at this shotgun wedding, and Kaamesh is turned out of the village. After committing a murder on the train, he is sentenced to jail. His new bride finds a job and gives birth to her son Gopi. It is when Gopi is a school going boy, a few years later that things come to a head.Ram's wife has been unable to conceive. A comic interlude occurs when a neighbour's wife Sundari gets pregnant. Ram and his wife contract for her to be a surrogate mother and hand over the child to Ram. Sundari agrees to carry the baby to term and hand it over to Ram and his wife. She herself has 6 sons named after each of the days of the week; one more child would be one too many.Kaamesh Singh, on his release from prison, turns his sister-in-law against his wife, by implying that his wife is having an affair with her husband. Ram's wife is so angry about his infidelity and swears vengeance against her sister. This sets the stage for the killing of Kaamesh Singh. How will this love triangle be resolved?

Title: Space Riders
Synopsis: Roger Gilbert is an adrenaline junkie who leads an otherwise ordinary life until one day he rides where no man had ridden before. On his ride to the planet Stardust 420, he meets an Aupian named Flou-krepto. Space Riders is a 1984 British 'Semi-Fictional' sports drama film, directed by Joe Massot. This film stars Grand Prix motorcycle racing world champion Barry Sheene as himself. It tells the story of Sheene's pursuit of the world title, including his recovery from a near-fatal accident at Silverstone.

Title: Ujed andjela
Synopsis: On the isolated island of Saint, a lighthouse keeper and his wife receive a message that a mysterious sailor is raping and killing women on lonely islands. The lighthouse keeper and his wife are estranged from each other, and she is in a state of constant anxiety and sexual irritation. In addition to the two of them, only an old barb and a displaced girl still live on the island. A mysterious naked man lands on the island.—HR Film

Title: Così parlò Bellavista
Synopsis: Naples, Italy, 1970. The story of an "expanded" family trying to overcome daily affairs.

Title: Barbarous Street
Synopsis: Daniel Chetman is tired of the violent neighborhood, and takes on the local gangster Mathias Hagen and his tugs.

Title: Ave Maria
Synopsis: A defrocked priest, Adolphe Eloi, and his mistress, Berthe Granjeux, who will call themselves Holy Father and Holy Mother set themselves up as the leaders of a religious sect.

Title: Ram Tera Desh
Synopsis: Ramdas, his wife, Savitri, son, Prakash, and daughter, Sunita, live a lower middle-class existence in Bombay. They would like to get Sunita get married, and soon receive a proposal through Champabai for her to be married to Prem Kumar Saxena. They find the proposal suitable and Sunita gets married to Prem, and moves into his house. Prem lives with his possessive mother, Kantadevi; his elder crippled brother, Surender; and a younger unmarried brother, Bittoo, who is having an affair with their maid-servant, Lily D'Souza. Sunita finds out that she has virtually no respect, is ill-treated, belittled, and slapped around, just because Ramdas was unable to pay the entire dowry sum. Her brother attempts to help, and attempts to secure some money to appease Sunita's mother-in-law, Kanta, but not only is he unsuccessful, but also gets killed in the process. Lily confides in Sunita that Kanta is quite capable of feeding her poison and killing her, as she had done to Prem's first wife. Now Sunita is at the mercy of the Saxena family, and the only way she can get rid of her problems is by killing herself.—rAjOo (gunwanti@hotmail.com)

Title: The Owl vs. Bumbo
Synopsis: Two retired thieves are blackmailed into teaching at a local Youth Probation Centre by ex-cop Chung. There, they teach the youngsters the value of self-respect. But their criminal past is never far behind.

Title: Tutti dentro
Synopsis: The incorruptible judge Annibale Salvemini, starts investigating over a classic Italian business/politics/corruption affair. He start to operate, as usual, very strongly. He orders numberless arrests. But the reaction of counterparts won't take long. In fact his strong energetic manners, drive him unintentionally on the opposite situation. Who is the real guilty the judge or the corrupted Italian society?—1felco

Title: Appassionata
Synopsis: Tsuya Shimamura, is born in Kyoto as the second daughter of a tea trader who dies before her birth. Tsuya, who loves painting more than anything and is hopeless at housework, attends art school.

Title: Andar Baahar
Synopsis: Successful in robbing a bank of huge sums of cash; criminal don, Shamsher Singh alias Shera refuses to part the loot with his accomplice, Raja and instead try to shoot him which results in the police apprehending both Raja and Shera. The court then sentence both to a long jail term but Shera manages to escape; many attempts by the police to re-arrest Shera proves fertile prompting inspector Ravi Khanna to seek permission from the police commissioner to let Raja out on parole for a period of one week. Raja agrees to assist Ravi but prove difficult to handle at first; as they get acquainted with each other the mission becomes much easier.—gavin (racktoo@hotmail.com) Inspector Ravi and Inspector Ajay are good friends while going to capture a criminal Shera whose wanted in bank robbery Ajay gets killed.Shera had committed the robbery along with his men Gulshan ,Gangu and Raja.In order to escape from cops Shera shot Raja and left him dying on the road.Raja is tortured in prison by Ravi for Shera's whereabouts. While Shera along with Gangu kidnaps sister of Gulshan as he is missing with looted money.Finally Ravi takes permission from his seniors to release Raja on bail in order to capture Shera.Raja being a womanizer only dreams about women and will Ravi a difficult time.—alex.mjacko@gmail.com Plainclothes Police Inspector, Ravi, has been assigned the task of apprehending notorious gangster, Shera, who, however, proves to be too elusive for him. Ravi then seeks the assistance of another gangster, who is doing time in prison, by the name of Raja. Ravi goes to meet Raja in prison, and requests his co-operation. Raja readily agrees to assist Ravi in this matter, and he is released from prison, in the custody of Ravi. What Ravi does not know that Raja has his own agenda behind this so-called co-operation, and will not hesitate to exploit his new-found freedom to the maximum possible level.—rAjOo (gunwanti@hotmail.com)

Title: Sabaniye
Synopsis: A poet, who works as a waiter to make ends meet, postures as a female singer to end a blood feud between two families.

Title: Kasam Paida Karne Wale Ki
Synopsis: Aarti lives with her only son Avinash. When Avinash falls in love and decides to get married, she tells him the truth about his father's death. Uday Singh a greedy, criminal sinister torments his nephew Satish for the property, completely making the kid grow-up to being insane. Though assuming Aarti to be his better half Satish gets married to her, but soon to his surprise the fact of her nasty game plan to steal the wealth has been revealed. Despite the fact he shows his genuine love - accepting her, parting her off with the money, on the condition that she agrees to stay life long with him. Having gauged the love she in-stores will power in Satish to fight back the goons for safety and justice, but Uday Singh sighting the danger gets him murdered. She stands up to being a sturdy feminine and decides, his son will be benevolent, yet will fight against injustice, and will disclose the fiasco which had been a nightmare when he is grown up to face the fact. Will she succeed? Will she fulfill her life long ambition?—gavin@sunny_deol2009@yahoo.com Satish can accumulate his family property when he turns 20 as he is just five years old its is taken care by his evil uncle Udaybhan Singh who has filled lot of fear in him so that he could give his property to him very easily when Satish gains adulthood he gets married to Aarti the next day he finds that Aarti had just come to rob him she is thrown out by Udaybhan Singh and Satish follows her to get back.Satish is then killed by Udaybhan Singh which he terms as suicide.A pregnant Aarti then swears that their child will come to revenge his father's death.Aarti pledges god to give her a son to complete her revenge,she gives birth to a son and names him Avinash who is a tough and fearless guy fighting against injustice.Avinash takes up a drummer job in nightclub where he meets the night club singer Leena both fall in love and want to get married soon that's when Aarti tells him that his first priority is to take revenge of hi father's death against Udaybhan Singh.—alex.mjacko@gmail.com After the passing of his father, Satish Kumar is the only heir to a vast estate. As he is only five years old, he is can only inherit it fully when he becomes 20, and the estate is placed under the care of his paternal uncle, Udaybhan, who carefully drugs and intimidates Satish to such an extent that Satish is terrified of his uncle's shadow. Years go by, Satish has achieved adulthood, is married to Aarti, but continues to live in fear of his uncle. After one night of bliss, Satish finds out that Aarti had only married him to rob him of cash and jewelry, he is devastated. Uday asks Aarti to leave, and Satish follows her. Aarti asks him for forgiveness, and he does so. However, Udaybhan knifes him to death, and has it written off by the Police as suicide. Aarti swears to avenge this through her child in her womb. Years later, Aarti and her son, Avinash, surface to avenge Satish's death - and it is here they will find out that it is not easy to hoodwink a wily Udaybhan, and they could well be endangering their very own lives.—rAjOo (gunwanti@hotmail.com)

Title: Al Hodoud
Synopsis: A traveler between two countries metaphorically named "Easternstan" and "Westernstan" loses his passport and identity papers. Stuck between the two countries he can neither cross the frontiers nor get back to where he came from. He's forced to camp in the neutral area between the two countries, facing a lot of funny situations while there. The movie satirizes the ideology of Arab unity and cooperation at the state level.—anonymous

Title: Class Relations
Synopsis: After making the domestic servant pregnant, a woman who doubles his age, a young man of only seventeen years from the German bourgeoisie is sent by his family to the United States in order to avoid a huge scandal.

Title: Mama Mia - Nur keine Panik
Synopsis: Bert Leitner and his wife Conny are a happy couple. They have two well-to-do children, Nicole and Sascha, and all could be all right if Bert did not take his job so seriously.

Title: Clash
Synopsis: A young woman has to take some dirty money to an abandoned warehouse and wait for a couple of gangsters to join here. Alone in this isolated place, she's suddenly accompanied by a man who's come to open the doors to other places...—Anonymous

Title: Bava Maradallu
Synopsis: Bava Maradallu is a 1994 Indian Telugu film, directed by A Kodandarami Reddy and produced by M Narasimha Rao. The film StarsRajinikanth, Ambhika, Radha, and Cass Mass in lead roles. The music of the film was composed by Chakravarthy.

Title: As Not to Fly the Smoke
Synopsis: Fahmy Abdel-Hadi is an outstanding rural student at the Faculty of Law. His dreams are simple and his dealings are dominated by idealism and purity. He collides with the bitter reality when he loses his mother in search of the price of her treatment while he sees his colleagues and those around him spending lavishly and mocking his poverty and even refusing to help him to treat his mother while he works to serve them. He decides to abandon idealism and take revenge on all those who failed him while he was poor.

Title: Lost in the Sahara
Synopsis: Two Spaniards traveling in the Sahara Desert get involved with danger, Tuareg tribesmen and a beautiful French girl.

Title: Thais
Synopsis: Thais, an Egyptian courtesan, is converted to a life of a penitant by Paphnutius, a holy man. She is taken to a convent in the desert and lives her life in the care of the abbess there. But Paphnutius is changed by the vision of Thais and becomes obsessed with gaining her love and retrieving her from the spiritual world for himself.—Jim Beaver <jumblejim@prodigy.net>

Title: Du-beat-e-o
Synopsis: A filmmaker tries to finish editing a movie about all-girl rock band Runaways.

Title: Pakhandi
Synopsis: Orphan brothers Ashok and Kishore get separated in childhood years later both con people for living and come across each other unknowingly that they are brothers.Kishore lives with his adopted sister Asha and her son whose husband is missing since years whose none other then Ashok.Kishore falls in love with a wealthy Preeti but a goon Ranjeet hires Ashok to marry Preeti pretending to be a wealth man so that they can run away with all their wealth.—alex.mjacko@gmail.com

Title: Desperate Teenage Lovedolls
Synopsis: The rise and fall of an all-girl punk rock band in Hollywood in the 1980s.

Title: Nallavanukku Nallavan
Synopsis: Gangadharan, a kind man reforms Manickam, a youngster and appoints him as in-charge in his factory. But Gangadharan becomes bankrupt and his son vows to avenge Manickam, believing that his father's business was swindled by Manickam.

Title: The Bodyguard
Synopsis: An accountant ,in love with a girl who married a shady guy , becomes her bodyguard,without her knowing it. An accountant works in his bossy mom's marriage bureau;at 33,Paul is still under her thumb and his fiancee cheats on him with one of his friends .He meets Barbara and falls in love with her ;sadly, she prefers Julien ,a more handsome guy, who manages a zoo ;but this good-looking chap 's first two wives mysteriously died .For fear Barbara may meet the same fate as the alleged victims, the rejected suitor follows them to Morocco where the newly -weds are to spend their honeymoon.Paul becomes some kind of bride's bodyguard ,but Barbara is blind to what could well be murder attempts.—dbdumonteil

Title: Khandhar
Synopsis: Subhash is a photographer from the city, who has come to take pictures of some old temples and ruins in a village. Ruins fascinate him. While in the village, he gets acquainted with a young woman, Jamini, who has had her heart broken in the past, by another visitor from the big city. Will history repeat itself, or will she find a way out of the ruins at last?—ajji-2

Title: Karishmaa
Synopsis: A photographer befriends three models, but lands in trouble when two of them are killed. Sunny a fashion photographer gets and assignment to work with top models for company of Rajasaheb.Two of his models Sapna and Neeta are murdered in similar passion suspicion leading to Sunny the killers next target is his girlfriend Nisha.Sunny while trying to save Nisha from the killer also has to run for his life from cops as well as Neeta's boyfriend Dev who wants him dead.—alex.mjacko@gmail.com

Title: Bukas luluhod ang mga tala
Synopsis: The illegitimate child of a rich man, living in poverty with her mother and humiliated by her legitimate half-sisters, becomes an overnight success as a singing sensation. A singer who rises from rags to riches must turn the tables on those who have wronged her. She promised that when she and her family had risen from poverty, discontent, and oppression, she would confront the stars of her past and make them kneel before her. Then her stepfather is killed by a dog and her brother is unjustly accused of a crime he never committed. She meets a young boy who discovers her and will help her overcome the obstacles, intrigues, traps, and even the stars that will tear them apart.—John Joshua Fernandez Rebecca grew up without a father. The father he knew married another woman, belonging to a rich family and had two daughters. Her mother re-married and gave birth to a baby boy. All her life, she was looked down and maltreated by the cruelty of her stepsisters. She made a vow to herself that someday, it will be a sweet vengeance.

Title: J'ai rencontré le Père Noël
Synopsis: Holiday tale of a young boy asking Santa for his parents, mysteriously vanished during an African expedition, to return home for Christmas.

Title: La Lola nos lleva al huerto
Synopsis: Ataúlfo and Paco, two friends, are told by Lola and Dolores, respectively, that they're going to be fathers on the same date.

Title: Sömnen
Synopsis: Tired of the touring life the rock star Tommy Cosmo cuts the strings of his guitar, empties his bank account, packs his revolver and takes off to find new values of life .

Title: Par où t'es rentré? On t'a pas vu sortir
Synopsis: Clovis Blaireau is a private detective. It is charged by Nadège de Courtaboeuf wife knew wealthy industrialist Prosper de Courtaboeuf, to obtain evidence of the infidelity of her husband. Clovis managed to penetrate the intimacy of Prosper, and became his friend. Following diverse Clovis and Prosper adventures will find themselves in Tunisis pursued by a band of Mafioso and by members of the Front of breaking load of Couscous.—markyoloup

Title: Massive Retaliation
Synopsis: Three families that are best friends head to their secret retreat when WW3 seems to be nearing. The adults arrive at the retreat and must endure the stress to come while the children are separated from the adults and have their own troubles along the way. This is a great story in the fact that many of these types of movies deal in violence while this one deals in the psychological aspect of the situation.—Nolan Price <noas4@earthlink.net>

Title: Alapaap
Synopsis: A YOUNG WRITER'S JOURNEY TO CREATIVITY IS PROPELLED BY THE USE OF DRUGS THAT INDUCE HALLUCINATIONS AND BRING HIM TO HIGHLAND FOLK MYSTICISM.

Title: Giddh: The Vulture
Synopsis: In a remote rural town in India, live a young woman named Ahnami and her husband, Bhashya. Bhashya is a laborer who earns a daily wage, drinks alcohol with part of it, and gives the rest to his wife for their livelihood. On some days he does not make any money, and as a result acts as a pimp for his wife, so that they can feed themselves. These are the two who are attempting to spearhead a awakening amongst this town which encourages young girls not to marry, but give themselves up to be devdasis (prostitutes), forever made to appease and satisfy males. These girls cannot marry locally as all the local young men have been sodomized, and the only way they can lead a normal life is by escaping to Bombay via a daily bus service. But even on the bus there is a pimp named Veerappan, who lures the girls on the pretext of a better life, but sells them in brothels in Bombay's red-light areas. There is no other route for these girls as the local police are apathetic, and corrupt, and the townspeople are all afraid to speak up out of fear of reprisals and superstition. Will this couple succeed in making any changes, or are they all doomed in the same vicious circle?—rAjOo (gunwanti@hotmail.com)

Title: Melvin: Son of Alvin
Synopsis: A shy young man is irresistible to women.

Title: Leonora
Synopsis: This movie revolves around Simon Erickson, a Grand Prix driver now turned car dealer, his wife Leonora, and the director of Simon's new television ad, Mark. Basically, Mark and Leonora have met in a previous life and are destined to be together, no matter what.—Joe Dzwonczyk <joedz@ultra.net.au> (From the back of the VHS) "This is the story of a sexual power struggle. It is a strongly erotic film, which also deals in psychic mind games. Beautiful Leonora becomes involved in a lethal love triangle between her ruthless husband, Simon, and her lover, Mark. There are more than sexual powers at work when Mark seeks the help of Helena, a celebrated clairvoyant. With this, the bewitchment begins."—alkimia915@gmail.com

Title: On the Line
Synopsis: A Border Patrol Agent is determined to catch his old nemesis, an American criminal who successfully smuggles illegal people across the border from Mexico.

Title: Bindiya Chamkegi
Synopsis: Shalini 'Shalu' lives a wealthy lifestyle with her businessman brother, Shyam Kapoor, and is expected to marry Surajbhan, the son of wealthy Thakursaheb. She would prefer that Shyam got married first so that he can have someone to look after him, but since he was in love with a woman named Maya, who betrayed him, and since then he has taken to alcohol in a big way, and hates women. When he fails to convince Shalu to marry, he gets married to a woman named Bindiya and brings her home with him. A thrilled Shalu gives her consent to get married, and also announces that she would like to give a formal reception for her brother's marriage. The reception does take place, but Thakursaheb subsequently informs Shyam that Surajbhan has already got married abroad to a woman of his choice. Shyam asks his friend, Ranjeet, and both arrange for Shalu's marriage to Daulatram's son, however, Bindiya does not approve of him, and as a result Shalu rejects him. What Shalu does not know is that Shyam is not really married, but has hired Bindiya to act as his wife; and what Shyam does not know is that Ranjeet is not who he really claims to be, but someone else who has got a number of scores to settle with Shyam.—rAjOo (gunwanti@hotmail.com)

Title: Ninja vs. Shaolin Guard
Synopsis: A troop of monks from the Shaolin Temple embark on a mission to get the Golden Sutra to Tibet after the Shaolin Abbot is killed by their traitorous teacher. They are joined on their quest by a beautiful, female warrior - with aims to avenge her father's death. They traverse forests and mountains on their mission, all the while fighting off deadly ninja assassins, vicious gangsters and even the undead.—Terracotta Distribution

Title: The Manhunt
Synopsis: A young man buys two horses at an Arizona race track but fails to get a receipt. Later, when riding across the land of a rancher named Robeson, he's accused of stealing the two horses. Unable to prove ownership, the young man is then sentenced to prison where he's forced to do chain-gang type work. He escapes, is recaptured, and escapes again as he tries to locate the man who sold him the horses.—dinky-4 of Minneapolis

Title: Postaci
Synopsis: Adem is a postman and he wants to marry Sevtap who is the sister of Latif who lives in Germany but he doesn't want his sister marry Adem. Adem doesn't give up and he will try everything to get married to Sevtap.

Title: Le tartuffe
Synopsis: Blinded by admiration, Orgon, a property-owning French man, brings the poor and insincere Tartuffe into his home and arranges for his daughter to marry him. Various members of the family attempt to have Tartuffe thrown out. Orgon is a man of property duped by the false piety of the penniless Tartuffe. Orgon takes him into his house, believing him a paragon of virtue. Orgon orders his daughter to reject her fiancé and marry Tartuffe. First Dorine, the family servant, tries a strategy to avert the marriage; then Orgon's son tries his hand. They anger Orgon, and to prove paternal power, he disinherits his son and makes Tartuffe his heir. Next Orgon's wife tries to bring her husband insight, a stratagem that partially backfires. With the bailiff at the door ordering Orgon to vacate his own home and with Tartuffe at court to prove Orgon's a traitor, all seems lost.—<jhailey@hotmail.com>

Title: Interface
Synopsis: A group of strange beings at a master computer control room use their equipment to kill people by remote control. On a quiet college campus, professor Hobson learns from the dean that a secret society based around hacking has been causing some trouble. Before Hobson can do much investingating, however, he learns that Bobby, one of his star students (and also an active hacker) has been killed. Although Hobson discovers that there really is a secret hacking society that has turned itself into a vigilante gang, he now has the more pressing task of proving to the police that he didn't kill Bobby himself. Will he be able to get to the bottom of this mystery before he gets thrown in jail?—Jean-Marc Rocher <rocher@fiberbit.net>

Title: The Oasis
Synopsis: A plane crash in the Mexican desert leaves a small group of survivors who are desperate for food and water. Fearing that they may never be found where they are, they head for where it is hoped there will be civilization and rescue. When their hopes prove unfounded, they must face the horrible possibility of choosing between giving up and dying, or doing the unthinkable to survive.—Jean-Marc Rocher <rocher@fiberbit.net>

Title: Arrapaho
Synopsis: Scella Pezzata, daughter of the Indian chief Heavy Ball of the Cefaloni tribe, is betrothed to Cavallo Pazzo, but is in love with Arrapaho, son of the Indian chief Mazza Nera of the Arrapaho tribe, who is in turn the object of Luna Caprese's wishes of the Froceyenne tribe.

Title: Sasural
Synopsis: Sasural is a 1984 Hindi movie produced by Biswanath Prasad Shahabadi and directed by Govind Moonis. The film stars Arun Govil, Bharat Bhushan, Arvind Deshpande, Gulshan Grover, Sadhana Singh and Dina Pathak.

Title: Dark of the Night
Synopsis: A small-town woman, fresh to the city, buys a second-hand Jaguar haunted by the ghost of a murdered woman and her killer. Meg moves out of her parents' home and buys a beautiful old Jaguar in a bid for independence. She begins to get strange feelings about the car. It seems to have a presence beyond the usual "personality" attributed to eccentric old cars. Slowly she uncovers the shocking history of the car's previous owner, but not before the car exerts some tragic influence in her life.—Tania Robinson <taniarobinson@hotmail.com>

Title: Poochakkoru Mookkuthi
Synopsis: The misunderstanding caused due to two women having the same name escalate wildly out of control for everyone involved.

Title: L'angelo custode
Synopsis: A gang of thieves plans to use a small child on their next heist.

Title: The City Never Sleeps
Synopsis: After two long decades at sea, a rugged former Rocker returns to Athens, Greece, to shed light on the untimely death of his ton-up boy brother. Haunted by the vivid memory of his late ton-up boy brother and the irrepressible need to unearth the truth, rugged former Rocker Nikos returns to Athens, Greece. And after two long decades at sea, the grizzled biker picks up where he left off, rubbing shoulders with the city's scum, sniffing out for clues in the heart of society's seedy underbelly. But as Nikos embarks on a high-octane, white-knuckle mission to shed light on the untimely death of his sibling, he is on a collision course with Athens' new breed of bikers and its decadent lords of crime. Now, as the past clashes with the present, there is no turning back. Can Nikos find closure in the city that never sleeps?—Nick Riganas

Title: Er Moretto - Von Liebe leben
Synopsis: This is the story of a runaway desperate poor 14 years old boy, becoming a prostitute and suffering all kinds of tribulations in Rome in the 80s. And the gay scene is somewhat accurate of those days

Title: Bagets 2
Synopsis: This sequel of the youth-oriented film chronicles the boys' final year of high school, culminating in their graduation.

Title: Dorian Gray in the Mirror of the Yellow Press
Synopsis: Our organization will create a human being whom we can shape and manipulate according to our needs. Dorian Gray: young, rich and handsome. We will make him, seduce him and break him.

Title: Atla Gel Saban
Synopsis: A poor man discovers his talent on the horse racing predictions but he is not the only one who is aware of his talent.

Title: Dreams of the City
Synopsis: A widow called Hayat is forced to move with her two children (Deeb) and (Omar) to reside with her father in Damascus, Deeb is forced to work during his studies so that the mother does not have to need anything from her father.

Title: Chinese Boxes
Synopsis: An American (Will Patton) in West Berlin finds himself caught up in murder and intrigue after his associate is killed and a diplomat's daughter is found dead in his room.

Title: A Test of Love
Synopsis: Due to an ignorant misdiagnosis, a three-year-old disabled girl was institutionalized and subsequently spent her entire childhood in a hospital for the severely retarded. A caring therapist helped her to prove her intellectual capability. In the 1970s, Jessica Hathaway (Angela Punch McGregor) joins the staff of Brentwood Hospital, a government facility for handicapped children in Melbourne, Australia. One of her patients is Annie O'Farrell (Tina Arhondis), whose cerebral palsy has kept her institutionalized since the age of 3. Convinced the girl, now 13, has been misdiagnosed as legally retarded, Jessica teaches her to communicate through a Ouija board in this true story about the fight to free Annie from institutional care.—Elora Matthias Annie's Coming Out (also known as A Test of Love) is a 1984 Australian drama film directed by Gil Brealey. It is based on the non-fiction book Annie's Coming Out by disability activists Rosemary Crossley and Anne McDonald. The book tells the story of McDonald's early life in a government institution for people with severe disabilities and her subsequent release.—Elora Matthias

Title: Laila
Synopsis: Bitter hatred has always existed between two Rajput families, namely those of Bharat Singh and Prithviraj Singh, resulting in the death of Bharat's nephew. Years later, Prithviraj's son Dharamraj marries Sunaina, who gives birth to a baby boy named Deshraj. On Deshraj's 10th birthday, Prithviraj goes to make peace with Bharat and invites him for a birthday party, which Bharat attends, but there is no end to the animosity--which results in the death of Prithviraj when his chauffeur, Chandu, is bribed and manipulated by Bharat and his men. Beside himself with anger, Dharamraj poisons Chandu and sends Deshraj to the U.S. to live in a safer atmosphere as her continues his studies. Years later, Deshraj returns home and meets and falls in love with a young woman named Leela, who is none other than Chandu's daughter. Fearing for his son's life, Dharamraj proposes peace with Bharat and would like his son to marry Bharat's daughter Padmini. When Deshraj refuses to marry Padmini, Dharamraj is beside himself with anger and has Leela abducted and imprisoned. Deshraj must now make a choice: he can marry Padmini and ensure peace between the two families, or he can elope with Leela and live a life full of fear and uncertainty, not knowing when they will be killed, and whether it will be at the hands of Bharat or Dharamraj.—rAjOo (gunwanti@hotmail.com)

Title: La muerte del chacal
Synopsis: A psycho-killer is on the loose targeting only young women. Grisly deaths pile up, one after another. The real problem is not finding out who he is, but instead, how to stop him.

Title: Sudden Love
Synopsis: Still reluctant to call it quits on her dying marriage, a conventional Athenian housewife gets caught up in a whirlwind romance with a successful man. Will this deliciously dangerous affair lead to true love or sharp disappointment? Eleni is thirty-three, a would-be dancer who no longer dances, a woman no longer in love with her husband, leading an uneventful bourgeois life. Grigoris is a successful economist, a career man who has lived in Paris for so long that he feels nostalgia for Greece and his boyhood years there. When they meet, they feel a sudden love for each other, a love that thrills them and threatens their quiet lives. Their love takes them to Lisbon, and perhaps even further. Still reluctant to call it quits on her dying marriage, Eleni, a conventional Athenian housewife and mother-of-one, watches her youthful dream of having a career as a professional dancer wane. However, a fateful encounter with Grigoris, a successful OECD expert and handsome family man living in France, will pave the way for an unexpected escape from Eleni's sluggish life. And, just like that, two perfect strangers will be taken by surprise by love's omnipotence, getting caught up in a whirlwind of emotions that defy logic. Who knows where this delightfully fascinating and deliciously dangerous romance leads? Will Eleni and Grigoris find true love or sharp, bittersweet disappointment at the journey's end?—Nick Riganas

Title: Ake and His World
Synopsis: In 1929, the film follows the six-year old son of a Swedish country doctor. Åke lives with his parents and his sister Aja in a small provincial town. His best friend is Kalle Nubb. Åke is very frightened of the janitor Bergström as well as the lunatic Anne-Marie, his cousin who lives in the attic. There is also the strict principal Godeman as well as the religious cobbler Ebenholtz.—Mattias Thuresson

Title: John Wycliffe: The Morning Star
Synopsis: The story of 14th century John Wycliffe, AKA "The Morning Star of the Reformation", who was the first to translate the Bible into English. John Wycliffe, the scholar and lay preacher of the 14th century who was later dubbed "The Morning Star of the Reformation", risked his life and freedom to criticize the Church for its abuses of power and its false teachings. The dramatized story of his life includes his battles with Church authorities, his relationship with the peasants and his realization that the Bible must be translated into English, so that the common man, as well as the learned, could read it.—J. Spurlin

Title: Tricheurs
Synopsis: Exploring themes of addiction, sexual power games, and compulsive behavior, a powerfully impudent look into the world of gambling addicts, Suzie is cast among a stylish milieu of gamblers on a Portuguese island. Elric has a gambling addiction: from casino to casino, he plays the roulette table, consumed by a twisted mix of intense pleasure and desperation. His encounter with Suzie throws his life into turmoil, but instead of curing his pathological passion, Suzie also falls prey to the game. Prisoners of their destiny, the couple plunge into another, more dangerous world, that of professional con artists.—Happy_Evil_Dude

Title: Space Cop Shaider: Pursuit! Shigi Shigi Abduction Plan
First Strike
Synopsis: A U.S. Navy submarine captain tries to prevent the Soviets from trying to launch World War III.

Title: Tentação na Cama
Synopsis: In São Paulo, the businessman Roberto has a broken leg plastered and is helped by his assistant Camila at home. His ex-wife and a man called Fernando are interested in a mysterious key that he possesses and Fernando sends three sexy women to Roberto's apartment to seduce him and find where the key is hidden. Wilma, Helena and Dora have sex with Roberto while Camila snoops her boss at the door, but they do not succeed in their intent. Meanwhile a thief breaks in his apartment and Roberto kills him in self-defense. The detective in charge of the investigation believes that Roberto is a gangster and leader of a gang. Fernando sends a letter to Roberto and schedules a meeting with him in a restaurant. Fernando proposes a deal to Roberto but he does not accept. Late night, Roberto explains to Camila that the desired key opens a bank safe where there is a black book, deeds and dollars, but they are interrupted by criminals that break in the apartment. However Roberto and Camila kill two gangsters. On the next morning, Fernando uses the urchin Kito that had befriended Roberto's daughter Tallyta to help him to abduct the little girl. Roberto's ex-wife kills Fernando and Roberto makes a deal with the police, delivering the key that is hidden in the plaster of his leg, and they rescue Tallyta from the criminals.—Claudio Carvalho, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

Title: Mera Faisla
Synopsis: Raj Saxena is in love with fellow collegian, Rati Verma, and both want to get married. Rati introduces Raj to her father, Major Verma, who, after finding out about Raj's background, decides to have nothing to do with him. For the Saxena family carries a stigma against their name - that of cowardice, betrayal, and corruption - which former Police Inspector Anand R. Saxena, Raj's dad, was accused of. Raj is humiliated by Verma's treatment, and swears to clear his father's name by joining the police force. What Raj does not know that in so doing, he has made himself a puppet in the hands of the very people who branded and stigmatized his father.—rAjOo (gunwanti@hotmail.com)

Title: Jocks
Synopsis: Two young friends tries to find a financial backer for the biggest disco party ever.

Title: E. Nick: A Legend in His Own Mind
Synopsis: In this spoof of Playboy, E. 'Nick' Vanacuzzi is a video magazine mogul who's invited several famous comedians to the premiere of the new issue. They get to meet his stars like the playmate of the month and the sex advice columnist.

Title: The Occupant
Synopsis: Angie goes to Hong Kong to work on a Master's thesis focusing on the Chinese superstition. She rents a spacious apartment, without knowing it's haunted by the ghost of a singer. Angie (Sally Yeh), a college student from Canada, returns to her native Hong Kong to work on a Master's thesis focusing on the superstition. Her topic will get much-needed attention as the spacious apartment rented out to her by women-crazed real estate broker Hansom Wong (Raymond Wong) is haunted by the ghost of a singer, whose life was cut short due to a triangle relationship argument. The ghost appears thereafter and, joined by cop Valentino Chow (Yun-Fat Chow), the three attempt to appease the spirit and send her back to the afterlife.—Oliver Chu

Title: Going Back
Synopsis: In 1964 two high school friends, Brice and Cleveland leave their suburban neighborhood in Michigan to spend the summer in the countryside before going off to college. They are befriended by a lonely farmer, Jack Bodell, who offers them a place to stay. As days pass, Cleveland helps Jack around the farm and finds in him the father figure he lacks, while Brice falls in love with a local girl named Cindy. The unforgettable summer ends too soon, but the memories linger. Four years later Brice and Cleveland drive up to Jack's farm and learn that there is no going back...—Ron Teachworth

Title: Maturanti (Pazi sta radis)
Synopsis: Last school days of one graduating generation. They should say goodbye to a part of life, part from their friends, and there is also uncertainty, hope, plans, wild love "for the rest of the life", and parents with their ambitions, and it would be all incomplete, if not for professors who are slowly losing their authority. Senior prom is the central place for serious and funny events in which parents, professors and pupils are involved. AKA: Watch your step (The graduates). Last school days of one graduating generation. They should say goodbye to a part of life, part from their friends, and there is also uncertainty, hope, plans, wild love "for the rest of the life", and parents with their ambitions, and it would be all incomplete, if not for professors who are slowly losing their authority. Senior prom is the central place for serious and funny events in which parents, professors and pupils are involved...

Title: Bones
Synopsis: An Aussie businessman is trying to find out why and by whom he was kidnapped and then later released with no explanation.

Title: Opasen char
Synopsis: He is well educated, charming, and gallant - a dream for each lonely lady. In reality he is a skillful swindler, who robs naive women. Cheating merchants with guilty consciences are his targets as well. This is the elusive protagonist of the movie. He constantly changes his name, stages his own death, and travels from town to town. His exploits are myriad and his life is an endless adventure. Yet, he remains an amiable swindler, an unrealized actor, whose only goal is make his life more interesting.—Georgi Djulgerov <georgidjul1943@gmail.com> Working 9 to 6 and being a civil servant is tough. Every day is the same. Striving with that routine for a long time and given the fact that he has a tremendous talent of speaking craftily and intellectually, Gencho Gunchev decides to break bad and run away from all the miserable life he had. His primary aim is to prey on lonely and naive women, passing himself off sometimes as an urbanist, sometimes as a bank branch manager. While doing these, he often chooses surnames reminding the birds like; hawk, eagle, pelican or falcon. Although he is not very handsome and even short, he takes advantage of saving the flamboyant words and phrases from his past, in order to seduce women, which are eager to be loved and carried. Travels from town to town and gaining experience with every case, he became aggressive, summing up more and more money and jewelry. But as every serial criminal, he has one weakness. In this case this is Beethoven's Moonlight Sonata. He is also obsessed with the famous architect Frank Lloyd Right, whom is mentioned many times in the film. Rising number of the deceived women alarms the police forces and they attempt to catch the perpetrator. But this going to take a while, because he even manages to declare himself as officially dead. After numerous attempts, police will track him down and catch him up, while he was performing his best performance ever. The movie is actually a "one man show", performed brilliantly by Todor Kolev and easily can be count as one of the biggest films of Bulgarian Cinema.

Title: Al este del oeste
Synopsis: Bill 'Golden Guns' is hired to free a town from its outlaws. He wants to remain unnoticed, but falls in love with the mayor's daughter and the situation gets complicated when she is kidnapped. Bill Pistolas de Oro (Fernando Esteso) está viajando a lomos de su caballo por el desierto. Se encuentra con una carreta conducida por una familia que va en dirección contraria y parece que tienen prisa por irse de un pueblo llamado Towermills. Se paran para corregir el número de habitantes del pueblo (142 sin ellos) y afirman que están emigrando a Alemania, porque desde que una pandilla de hombres ha escogido el pueblo para emborracharse todas las noches, la tranquilidad se ha esfumado, y la economía del pueblo se ha resentido.En el pueblo, todo el mundo está corriendo de un lado para otro como pollos sin cabeza. El Firtn Bank pone un cartel afuera que dice "CERRADO POR INSEGURIDAD CIUDADANA". Polonio Horacio Platón (Antonio Ozores) que vende su pócima curalotodo Magic Elixir desde su carromato, se sorprede al ver todo el jaleo.Marta (Pilar Bardem) se entera del plan del Alcalde (Conrado San Martín), que harto de que en Washington no hagan caso de sus problemas, ha decidido a contratar a Bill Pistolas de Oro. El barbero (Francisco Camoiras), también está presente. Marta se preocupa por cómmo van a pagarle, pero el precio lo pondrá él, y cobra en dólares o en especies. La hija del alcalde, Margaret Rose (Adriana Vega) inmediatamente se pone a soñar con que el famoso Bill la escoja a ella como "especie".En ese momento entra el vetusto Sheriff (Emilio Fornet) para dimitir. Tumbas (Víctor Israel) también tiene quejas: no le han enviado las tablas para hacer los nuevos ataúdes. Nadie acude ante el curalotodo de Polonio. Bill llega a Towermills, y Tumbas lo mide - como es pequeño, sí que tiene suficientes recortes para hacerle la tumba. En ese momento, llegan los Mata, y empiezan a disparar a todo y a todos sin ton ni son. Todos los habitantes se acercan a la puerta a mirar qué pasa, y después se meten otra vez en casa. La única persona que les hace frente es la madam del saloon local, Stella (África Pratt), que les dice que está harta de que no le paguen lo que beben y lo que destrozan. Ella les hace pagar. Mientras, Chapulín (Fernando Sancho) va a hablar con el director del banco First (Luis Barbero), que le dice que la caja fuerte está vacía desde que les dio por pasarse por el pueblo cada 15 días. Como no tiene dinero, Chapulín les roba la ropa.Mientras todo esto pasa, Bill Pistola de Oro se ha escondido, primero tirándose al abrevadero de caballos, y luego metiéndose entre balas de heno. Después del suceso, el Alcalde vuelve a nombrar Sheriff al shérif. En el salón, Stella está limpiando el desastre, y Blackandécker (Juanito Navarro), el barman indio, pone un vaso a Bill, que entabla conversación con Polonio. Llegan el alcalde, Margaret Rose y el barbero, mientras Polonio y Bill empiezan a pasarse el vaso de uno a otro por la barra del saloon. Acaban los dos haciendo una competición de tiro. Hay una ensalada de tiros, hasta que Stella se enfada y los manda parar: ni uno ni otro han acertado.Margaret Rose empieza a insinuarse a Bill, que se baña vestido para así lavar la ropa al mismo tiempo, pero que se niega a decir quién es él. Margaret Rose se despelota delante de él, así que Bill acaba admitiendo que es un pistolero. Se meten juntos en la cama, pero el cinturón se le encasquilla. Por su parte, Stella piensa que es Polonio el pistolero. Polonio acaba asintiendo, porque ve la posibilidad que todos sus gastos le salgan gratis. Bill, Polonio, el alcalde y el tahúr (Francisco Nieto) se ponen a jugar al póker: Bill lleva su dinero escondido en el sombrero. El tahúr debería ganar, pero hace como que no. Polonio gana, aunque había apostado con el dinero de su compañero. Otra vez, Bill no debería haber ganado, pero gana. Resulta que todos los jugadores tienen ases en la siguiente partida, así que Bill y Polonio se reparten el dinero. Bill está pensando en comprar un terreno en Towermills.Bill dice que Polonio pondrá paz en el pueblo, y Polonio dice que será Bill. Blackandécker los lleva a un rancho medio derruido. Para demostrar que la tierra es fertil, les manda desenterrar una bolsa de patatas fritas. En ese momento, llega un mensajero para decirles que Chapulín ha secuestrado a Margaret Rose, y el sheriff vuelve a dimitir, - la primera vez dijo que su abuela se había muerto, ahora dice que sus padres van a casarse. El alcalde acepta su dimisión, llamándole cobarde. Ahora es cuando Polonio dice que él no es el pistolero, y Bill dice que tampoco, aunque al final acepta ir a salvar a la chica. El alcalde manda a Polonio y Bill solos, y Blackandécker será su guía. Los tres parten hacia allá.Ven a unas jóvenes bañándose desnudas. Se lanzan sobre ellas, pero Maite (Mayte Sancho), amenaza con pegarles un tiro en los huevos si no se van. Maite les dice que van a trabajar en el saloon de Stella. Maite les dice que, sin pagar, no habrá nada de nada. Blackandécker se mete en la tienda de Maite, dado que ella tiene que llevarse la tercera parte.A la mañana siguiente, se separan. Chapulín intenta convencer a Margaret Rose, diciédole que puede vivir mucho mejor si es amable con él. Bill y Polonio van al rescate. Polonio llama marica a Chapulín y sus hombres. Se pelean. Aprovechando lo ocasión, otro de sus hombres, MacFinn (José Manuel Martín) se lleva a la chica. Tanto Chapulín como los tres protas van detrás de ellos.Black disfraza a Bill y Polonio de indios navajos, y los oculta en su tipi. Sietemuelles y Chapulín se fuman la pipa de la paz y se emborrachan. Como el disfraz de Bill es de mujer, un indio llamado Indio Acostado quiere hacerle su esposa. Polonio y Black aporrean a Bill pensando que es el otro.Margaret Rose se deja querer por MacFinn. Cuando Polonio, Bill y Black llegan, ven todo, incluido una caja con un montón de dinero. Bill manda a todos los malos desnudarse a punta de pistola, y rescata a Margaret Rose, que se lleva el tesoro.Polonio y Black se hacen pasar por dos monjes que van a casar a Margaret Rose - a quien se le ve un pecho desnudo continuamente - con MacFinn. Devuelven a la chica a su padre. MacFinn y Chapulín se ponen de acuerdo para arrasar el pueblo. El sheriff dimite por tercera vez, diciendo que va a votar por la autonomía.Bill los arenga para lacerles una trampa. Resulta que ninguno de los dos era un pistolero, pero Bill se viste de blanco y ya da el pago. Margaret Rose suspira por él.Stella es quien primero se enfrenta a ellos. Stella y las chicas se deshacen de casi todos. Polonio dispara a dos fingiendo que está herido. Bill es quien se enfrenta a MacFinn y Chapulín, y los desarma sin esfuerzo. Ahora los dos criminales se dan cuenta de que él sí es de verdad Bill Pistolas de Oro. A disparos los desnuda, y todos salen huyendo del pueblo.Todos felicitan a Bill, que rechaza su recompensa, para que el dinero vaya para pagar el sueldo de un shérif decente al este del oeste. Silva y aparece su caballo blanco, llamado Silver, y se va, dejando el corazón destrozado de Margaret Rose. Al final, Bill se va en bicicleta.

Title: Sharara
Synopsis: Sharara is a 1984 Indian Bollywood action,adult film released on Feb 24, 1984. The film is directed by S. V. Rajendra Singh. An infiltrator is dropped near Indias northern border with instructions to secure a classified document. Colonel Dharam Veer Singh Pathan is in charge of the unit in the forward area. He tracks down and liquidates the spy. Vicky and his Gypsy girl Chandni are next put on the job, as Chandani bears the close resemblance with the Colonels daughter Madhu. Madhu is kidnapped and Chandani passes off as Madhu and secures the classified document. The Colonel, however commandeers a blowup operation and emerges victorious both personally and officially.

Title: Mumbaicha Fauzdar
Synopsis: Sweet and Sour love story of a police officer in Mumbai and his village belly wife. Patil father of Saku wants her to marry a police officer who serves in Mumbai police force.Jaisingh Rao Mohite a handsome bachelor serving in Mumbai's police force arrives in the village and inspired by his way of work and personality Patil wants Sakhu to marry him but he is in love with a journalist Madhuri.When Jaisingh visits his father he is shocked to know that his marriage is already being fixed to Saku against his wishes and unhappy with it as she is illiterate and childish.This starts a sweet and sour love story between them where Saku tries her best to impress Jaisingh but he is still unhappy as she is still a village girl.—alex.mjacko@gmail.com

Title: Silver City
Synopsis: After World War II, 4,000 Polish families came to Australia. They were Jews, Fascists, anti-Communists, and others dispossessed. In a large hostel, where even married men and women were housed in separate barracks, the adults lived for two years while they worked off the government's payment of their passage. Even though he is married to Anna and has a son, Julian falls in love with Nina and she with him. As they and others face the new situations and prejudices that await immigrants and as they take on aspects of Australian culture, old-country values reassert themselves. Julian decides what to do about love and family, and Nina must find a way to move on.—<jhailey@hotmail.com>

Title: Nokketha Dhoorathu Kannum Nattu
Synopsis: A young girl on an unannounced visit changes the lives of her lonely grandmother and several other people in the neighbourhood by her joie de vivre.

Title: Deadly Impact
Synopsis: A computer hacker calculates a system of monitoring the slot machines at various Las Vegas casinos, and he and his girlfriend make a killing. Other criminals kidnap the duo and force them to give up the money.

Title: Zavallilar
Synopsis: Berhan fled to the city with his wife and two children due to the feud in the village, but his enemy does not leave him and his family alone in the city.

Title: A Man Called Rage
Synopsis: In a post-apocalyptic world, a soldier of fortune enters "The Forbidden Land" to find uranium that will help save mankind. However, a rival adventurer is also after the uranium, but for his own ends.

Title: Best Revenge
Synopsis: An American tourist in Spain is forced to take part in a four million dollar drug deal, because his best friend has been kidnapped, and is being tortured by the drug kingpin who set up the operation.

Title: King Thrushbeard
Synopsis: A fairy-tale about a beautiful but very haughty princess Anna who cruelly mocks each of her suitors. Finally she is forced by the king to marry a beggar. The poor life, hard work and love teach the princess a lesson and turn her into a loving and kind person.—Michael

Title: Kanoon Kya Karega
Synopsis: Advocate Gautam Mehra lives in Bombay with his wife, Anju, and a daughter, Rakhsa. One day while returning from court he sees a woman being molested. He stops, phones the police, and then tries to stop the molester, in vain, though as himself gets attacked and loses consciousness. But the police do arrive and arrest the molester. Raghuvir's attempts to convince Gautam to change his testimony are in vain. Gautam goes on to testify against Raghuvir Singh, and gets him sentenced to seven years rigorous prison. Six years later, Raghuvir re-enters the lives of the Mehras, and he is not going to disappear until he has had his vengeance against all three. Efforts to stop him through the police are in vain, as he has not committed any crime yet. The Mehras decide to re-locate to their farm house near a lake without notifying anyone. While they are being re-located Gautam finds out that it is not just Raghuvir who is out for vengeance - there is someone other than him who wants them dead.—rAjOo (gunwanti@hotmail.com)

Title: Double Feature
Synopsis: The film tells the story of the friendship between two men who live their lives through movies. One is a director who is having trouble connecting with his children; the other is a screenwriter and playwright who is having trouble with his wife. They're working on a film together about growing old and connecting with the younger generation.

Title: Satan's Touch
Synopsis: A struggling grocery-store owner makes a deal with Satan that gives him the power to gamble in Las Vegas and Atlantic City casinos without losing. However, his deal is threatened with exposure when a casino boss suspicious of his "winning streak" begins to investigate him.—frankfob2@yahoo.com

Title: Qualcosa di biondo
Synopsis: A single mother tries to trace previous partners to help her fund a life-changing operation for her blind son.

Title: Lucie, postrach ulice
Synopsis: A children's fantasy comedy about little Lucie, the nasty leader of the boys' party Osvald and two magical characters from the plasticine. Lucie is a six-year-old girl who can't wait to go to school for the first time. And since all her friends are still on holiday, she has no one to play with. Osvald's fifth-grade group doesn't care about little girls. Unless she proves her mettle by shoplifting. Lucie goes to the department store and reaches for a box of plasticine. And this is the beginning of an extraordinary adventure, for out of the box come two magical plasticine figures who become Lucie's mythical friends with whom she will have the most wonderful adventure at the end of the summer. Directly followed by...a zase ta Lucie! (1984).—EuroFan

Title: Uindii
Synopsis: Kei is a professional motorcycle racer with a young daughter from an earlier marriage, and a busy schedule that takes him to West Berlin.

Title: Anand Aur Anand
Synopsis: Arun Anand has been married for several years now, but his wife is unable to conceive. Arun's has an affair with his personal secretary, Kiran, and as a result Kiran gets pregnant. Arun does not want a scandal to upset his wife, so he asks an impotent union leader, Pratap Singh, to marry Kiran, sire the child, and then divorce her, all for a hefty sum of money. Pratap agrees to this arrangement, and soon a boy is born. Pratap then changes his mind about divorcing Kiran, as her son is proof of his virility and manhood, and as such disappears from Arun's life. Years later Kiran's son has grown up and named Varun Singh. Arun finally finds out about them and meets them, but is rejected by Varun, who has come to accept Pratap as his father. There is a confrontation between Pratap and his employer, Thakur, and as a result, Varun is abducted, tied to a tree with four wild elephants who are made to drink alcohol, and after which will go on a drunken and virtually unstoppable rampage - starting with the gory death of the person nearest to them - Varun.—rAjOo (gunwanti@hotmail.com)

Title: Bandhana
Synopsis: A doctor falls in love with his student. The story is about a doctor played by Vishnuvardhan who falls in love with his student doctor played by Suhasini. Vishnuvardhan tries to tell his feelings to her but fails to do so. When he finally musters courage to tell her that he loves her, she tells him that her marriage is fixed to Jai Jagadeesh her childhood friend and thinks of him like a guru. Vishnuvardhan cannot forget her and slowly withdraws into a shell. His mother tries to get him out of this shell but dies because of burns. Meanwhile, Jai Jagadeesh starts suspecting his wife because she gives importance to the hospital and not him and starts misbehaving with her at home. Suhasini discovers that Vishnuvardhan has heart enlargement and may not survive for long. Since he has no family she starts taking more care of him in hospital. This frustrates her husband even more and he misunderstands Vishnuvardhan and fights with him.—Girish The story is about a doctor played by Vishnuvardhan who falls in love with his student doctor played by Suhasini. Vishnuvardhan tries to tell his feelings to her but fails to do so. When he finally musters courage to tell her that he loves her she tells him that her marriage is fixed to Jai Jagadeesh her childhood friend and thinks of him like a guru. Vishnuvardhan cannot forget her and slowly withdraws into a shell. His mother tries to get him out of this shell but dies because of burns. Meanwhile, Jai Jagadeesh starts suspecting his wife because she gives importance to hospital and not him and starts misbehaving with her at home. Suhasini discovers that Vishnuvardhan has heart enlargement and may not survive for long. Since he has no family she starts taking more care of him in hospital. This frustrates her husband even more and he misunderstands Vishnuvardhan and fights with him in the hospital. Suhasini goes to her residence to explain to her husband but discovers that her husband has abused a lady who was staying in their house(maid). She decides to leave him but Vishnuvardhan tries to convince her husband that his relationship with Suhasini is pure and he has misunderstood them. Jai Jagadeesh misbehaves with Vishnuvardhan and Suhasini gets hurt while trying to make sense with her husband. Finally Vishnuvardhan saves the baby but dies. Suhasini divorces her husband and moves on with her just born child.

Title: Doraemon: Nobita's Great Adventure into the Underworld
Synopsis: Nobita requests of Doraemon the Moshimo-box and wishes for the world to become a place where the use of magic is possible. Witchcraft replaces science and technology and everyone makes use of it on their daily lives.

Title: Sex Education
Synopsis: YOUNG BOYS LEARN THEIR FIRST LESSONS IN SEX FROM A SLIGHTLY OLDER WOMAN IN THE NEIGHBORHOOD.

Title: All Rounder
Synopsis: Ajay and Birju are brothers. Birju encourages his brother, who loves cricket, to become a professional, and he does so.
